medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Acute onset abdominal pain started yesterday. Initially periumbilical/mid abdominal pain that migrated to the right flank/right lower quadrant, associated with anorexia. Subjective fevers noted this morning. Last oral intake was over 24 hours ago.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Gout, allergic rhinitis. Status post open reduction and external fixation and bone graft of the right wrist. Status post arthroscopy of the right knee.
